    2018-04-02

    1.0

    • Field Detail

      • xSwingPos

        private int xSwingPos
        Represents the x position of the Swing.

      • ySwingPos

        private int ySwingPos
        Represents the y position of the Swing.

      • symbol

        private char symbol
        Symbol of the Ogre. Standard symbol is '0'. If Ogre is sleeping symbol is '8'.

      • sleepCount

        private int sleepCount
        Number of movements of Hero can do without Ogre move. Starts at 0. Ogre moves normally, randomly. Ogre fall asleep if Hero is next to him sleepCount is se to 2. Each Hero move, sleepCount is decremented. If reaches 0, Ogre wake up and move normally.

      • m

        private char[][] m
        Represents the map of Level.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ogre

        public Ogre(int x,
            int y,
            char[][] m)
        Creates a new Ogre with the given position, x and y, and map.
        Parameters:
        x - X position.
        y - Y position.
        m - char[][] map.

      • Ogre

        public Ogre(int x,
            int y,
            int xS,
            int yS,
            char sym,
            int sleep,
            char[][] m)
        Creates a new Ogre with the given position, x and y, xSwing, ySwing, symbol, sleepCount and map.
        Parameters:
        x - X position of Ogre.
        y - Y position of Ogre.
        xS - X position of his Swing.
        yS - Y position of his Swing.
        sym - symbol of the Ogre.
        sleep - sleepCount of Ogre's sleep.
        m - char[][] map.

    • Method Detail

      • getSymbol

        public char getSymbol()
        Gets Ogre's symbol.
        Returns:
        symbol variable of Ogre.

      • getSleepCount

        public int getSleepCount()
        Gets Ogre's sleepCount.
        Returns:
        sleepCount variable of Ogre.

      • move

        public void move(char[][] map)
        Moves the Ogre in the respective given map. Respecting the logic of the game.
        Parameters:
        map - char[][] Map to be set.

      • moveWithSleepCount0

        public void moveWithSleepCount0(char[][] map)
        Moves the Ogre in the respective given map when sleepCount is 0. Respecting the logic of the game.
        Parameters:
        map - char[][] Map to be set.

      • swing

        public void swing(char[][] map)
        Places the swing near Ogre's position. Can be in the top, down, left or right of Ogre.
        Parameters:
        map - given map where is Ogre.

      • stun

        public void stun(char[][] map)
        Stuns Ogre for 2 seconds. Changes his symbol to '8'. Sets sleepCount variable to 2.
        Parameters:
        map - given map where Ogre is stunned.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame(java.io.BufferedWriter writer)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the information of the Guard.
        Parameters:
        writer - BufferedWriter writer to be set with the respective info.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws exception if fails on writing.
